column4: i get no-package for eclipse-jdt. i guess because i'm running hoary. can I get around it w/o fully upgrading to breezy?
dare i type in apt-get dist-upgrade on a hoary system ? (to get to breezy)
as long as you have not gone off around the world installing mad software from all over the place
okay before you do consider backing up your software, and having a breezy live or install cd to hand
well if that is that case then do 5.10 and dapper after next week
